èkoca'aghi ḍâ, orèng binè, sè kangoḍâân noro' patona orèng lakèna adhingghâl dhunnya, orèng binè' ghellâ' pas atèngka

cè' sennengnga amarghâ ollè ontong ḍu kalè

ollè kalakonan sè bânnya'

orèng lakè' sè ta' anḍi' napso akabin

nèpo orèng sè lebbhi pènterran gâri dhibi'na

èkoca'aghi ḍâ' kanca sè ta' kennèng rapeddhi ongghu

sèngko' lèbur ḍâ' kaèn bhâtèk sè aghâmbhâr "mano' hong" amarghâ laspadhâ ongghu acerrè madhurâ
